issue.title: [Flight] Allow serving with multiple TLS certificates
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5529](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5529). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should allow serving a Flight service with more than one TLS certificate. This makes health checking easier in large deployments.
